Gemini Summary

State of the Market Summary:

  • The Financial Stress Composite indicates a "Neutral" regime with a value of 0.045 as of 2025-11-30.
  • Systemic stress, represented by STLFSI4, shows the most extreme positioning with a robust z-score of 1.104.

Technical Summary:

  • STLFSI4's z-score of 1.104 signals a significant stretch towards higher systemic tension.
  • High-yield option-adjusted spreads (HY_OAS) and the inverted yield curve (T10Y2Y) show less extreme conditions, with z-scores of -0.427 and -0.541 respectively.

References:

  • Financial Stress Composite data (latest: 2025-11-30). The STLFSI4 component's z-score of 1.104 heavily influenced conclusions.
  • Additional public datasets: VIX (Cboe Volatility Index) to capture market expectations of near-term volatility.
  • Additional public datasets: SOFR spreads to assess money market liquidity and counterparty risk perception.
